title: PM Wallpaper Slideshow 1.0.1
description: This program allow you to program a list of pictures to use as your desktop&#039;s wallpaper, and change your wallpaper hourly or at any time interval.It is a great way to show your wallpaper at their best. Creating a slide show is as simple as selecting a folder from the PMWallpaperSlideshow browse window and pressing play. Supports JPG, GIF, PNG, TIF, BMP file formats.
